TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Letsie_III, title = Letsie_III, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Letsie_III} }

S.FORM: Letsie III ryax sa tay 17 nqu tay 7, Letsie III, squliq na sezi'. (minhtuw sa kawas tay 1963) mrhuw Lesotho ta' misuw hya' ga Letsie III, aring ryax tay 7 squ byacing tay 2 sa kawas 1996 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
